name: 莊清松
objective:
一、　　提供使用陣列天線系統執行空域濾波器之基本概念。
二、　　提供陣列空域信號處理基本架構及其工作原理及理論基礎。
三、　　提供空域陣列波束成型基本法則參數及其相關技術。
四、　　提供自調式干擾源去除處理技術發展與應用。
五、　　提供空域干擾源偵測處理技術發展與應用。
六、　　提供多輸入多輸出陣列無線傳播之架構及發展技術。
The use of the adaptive array can be one of the most promising approaches to improve the signal to noise and interference ratio for modern wireless radio communication or network systems. Accordingly the object of this course can be simply summarized as follows;
— To introduce the fundamental concepts on spatial filter using antenna array.
— To introduce an up-dated space-time approach to tackle the problem of interferences and to speed the data rate for modern high QoS wireless communications.
— To provide an analytic technique may be useful for improving and estimating the performance in other new applications
